titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of by the church-wardens and sworne-men within the Archdeaconrie of Excester in the visitation of the Right Worshipful Thomas Barret, Archdeacon of the said Archdeaconrie of Excester. Anno Domini, 1612..
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Exeter.
Barret, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Title vignette, headpieces on t.p. with royal arms, tailpiece, initials.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
